description: A generic SAN event has occurred. The variables are:
severityLevel - the event severity level;
category - Category of the event being reported;
code - ID of the event in the given category;
msgString - the message string describing
the event;
contactName - the name of the individual
to be notified of the event;
contactEmail - the e-mail address of the
individual referred to in contactName;
contactWorkPhone - the work phone number
of the individual referred to in
contactName;
contactHomePhone - the home phone number
of the individual referred to in
contactName;
contactPager - the pager number of the
individual referred to in contactName;
contactFax - the FAX number of the individual
referred to in contactName
-- The following are attributes used by xnmloadmib for improved formatting
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPOvSam-MIB-V1::genericSanEvent HPOvSam-MIB-V1::severityLevel i 1 HPOvSam-MIB-V1::category s EXAMPLE HPOvSam-MIB-V1::id i 9999 HPOvSam-MIB-V1::msgString s EXAMPLE HPOvSam-MIB-V1::contactName s EXAMPLE HPOvSam-MIB-V1::contactEmail s EXAMPLE HPOvSam-MIB-V1::contactWorkPhone s EXAMPLE HPOvSam-MIB-V1::contactHomePhone s EXAMPLE HPOvSam-MIB-V1::contactPager s EXAMPLE HPOvSam-MIB-V1::contactFax s EXAMPLE

description: Category of the event being reported
variables.name: HPOvSam-MIB-V1::category

description: ID number of the event within the given category
variables.name: HPOvSam-MIB-V1::id

description: Message string associated with the event being reported.
variables.name: HPOvSam-MIB-V1::msgString

description: Name of the person to be notified of the
occurence of the event being reported.
variables.name: HPOvSam-MIB-V1::contactName

description: Email address of the individual referenced by
an instance of the contactName variable.

description: Work telephone number of the individual

variable.
variables.name: HPOvSam-MIB-V1::contactWorkPhone

description: Home telephone number of the individual
referenced by an instance of the contactName
variable.
variables.name: HPOvSam-MIB-V1::contactHomePhone

description: Pager telephone number of the individual
referenced by an instance of the contactName
variable.
variables.name: HPOvSam-MIB-V1::contactPager

description: Fax telephone number of the individual
referenced by an instance of the contactName
variable.
variables.name: HPOvSam-MIB-V1::contactFax

description: A SAN Device Event has occurred. The variables are:
severityLevel - the event severity level;
category - Category of the event being reported;
code - ID of the event in the given category;
msgString - the message string describing
the event;
contactName - the name of the individual
to be notified of the event;
contactEmail - the e-mail address of the
individual referred to in contactName;
contactWorkPhone - the work phone number
of the individual referred to in
contactName;
contactHomePhone - the home phone number
of the individual referred to in
contactName;
contactPager - the pager number of the
individual referred to in contactName;
contactFax - the FAX number of the individual
referred to in contactName;
sourceName - Event source 'friendly' name;
uniqueId - Unique identifier of device that
is source of event;
vendorId - Vendor identifier of device that
is source of event;
prodId - Product identifier of device that
is source of event;
prodRev - Product revision of device that is
source of event;
serialNo - Serial number of device that is
source of event
storageDom - Storage domain in which the device
is located
-- The following are attributes used by xnmloadmib for improved formatting
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPOvSam-MIB-V1::sanDeviceEvent HPOvSam-MIB-V1::severityLevel i 1 HPOvSam-MIB-V1::category s EXAMPLE HPOvSam-MIB-V1::id i 9999 HPOvSam-MIB-V1::msgString s EXAMPLE HPOvSam-MIB-V1::contactName s EXAMPLE HPOvSam-MIB-V1::contactEmail s EXAMPLE HPOvSam-MIB-V1::contactWorkPhone s EXAMPLE HPOvSam-MIB-V1::contactHomePhone s EXAMPLE HPOvSam-MIB-V1::contactPager s EXAMPLE HPOvSam-MIB-V1::contactFax s EXAMPLE HPOvSam-MIB-V1::sourceName s EXAMPLE HPOvSam-MIB-V1::uniqueId s EXAMPLE HPOvSam-MIB-V1::vendorId s EXAMPLE HPOvSam-MIB-V1::prodId s EXAMPLE HPOvSam-MIB-V1::prodRev s EXAMPLE HPOvSam-MIB-V1::serialNo s EXAMPLE HPOvSam-MIB-V1::storageDmn s EXAMPLE
